My name is Kalyan Bandaru and I am a data scientist with a passion for solving complex problems using data-driven insights. With a strong foundation in statistics, programming, and machine learning, I have honed my skills in data analysis, predictive modeling, and data visualization.

In my free time, I enjoy exploring new technologies, learning new skills, and contributing to the data science community. I am excited about the endless possibilities that data science offers and am always looking for new challenges to tackle.
